name: sharpshooter
description:
According to the task requirements of the government, you carry some weapons and go deep into the enemy's lair. Can you complete the task without a teammate?

This is a novel shooting game, focusing on testing the fast reaction ability of players. Kill the enemy and give you a new shooting game experience.

The enemies on the map make all places dangerous and exciting.

As a special soldier, you can switch various unique weapons.

Use your superb operation to find different angles and kill the enemy skillfully.

Check your surroundings regularly to ensure that the enemy is killed safely.

characteristic:

There is no limit to bullets, but it takes time to change cartridges.

To fully avoid the enemy's bullets, you will easily die!
